label: 水無月会
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [Passim] The Lotus Lectures and disputations at the Sixth Month Service (minazukie, Dengyō chōkō, daishikō) marked the death date (4 vi) of Dengyō Daishi (Saichō; 767-822), the founder of the Japanese Tendai sect (p511n). [伝教長講、大師講、伝教大師、最澄、天台]
